content.question: Which of the following explains why Bosnia and Herzegovina would want to join the European Union (EU)?

choices.label: To increase the chances of joining NATO and protection against Russian invasion
To benefit from the EU single currency and open borders that exist between their countryâ€™s neighboring states
To benefit from the EU single currency and eliminate the cost of currency exchange with the United Kingdom, Denmark, and Sweden
To participate in the EU free trade zone and automatically receive the protection of NATO
To benefit from the EU free trade zone and achieve economic and social stability

content.answer: To benefit from the EU free trade zone and achieve economic and social stability
